description: Option B full scaling sweep: FE vs MC on 3D HP lattice protein folding
notes: All parameters are LOCKED across all lengths. No per-length tuning.
Seeds are unique per length. No seed reuse across lengths.
Thresholds E*(L) are declared in Phase A (pilot) before Phase B (main).
Phase A: 200 FE + 200 MC per length to establish E*(L).
Phase B: 2000 FE + 2000 MC per length using locked E*(L).
